feed.title: NetBird Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.30.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [relay, client] Relay/fix/wg roaming by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2691
  • [management] Refactor getAccountIDWithAuthorizationClaims by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2715
  • [client] Add table filter rules using iptables by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2727
  • [relay-server] Move the handshake logic to a separated struct by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2648
  • [management] Add session expire functionality based on inactivity by @ctrl-zzz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2326
  • [client] Add universal bin build and update sign workflow version by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2738
  • [client] Exclude loopback from NAT by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2747
  • [misc] Update Zitadel version on quickstart script by @eoksum in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2744
  • [management] Fix JSON function compatibility for SQLite and PostgreSQL by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2746

New Contributors

  • @eoksum made their first contribution in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2744

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.30.1...v0.30.2

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.30.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [management] Fix domain information is up to date check by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2754
  • Fix decompress zip path by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2755
  • Update sign workflow version by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2756
  • Release global lock on early error by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2760
  • Replace suite tests with regular go tests by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2762
  • [management] Fix context cancellation with JWT group sync enabled by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2767
  • [client] Eliminate UDP proxy in user-space mode by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2712
  • [management] Optimize network map updates by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2718
  • [management] Fix session inactivity response by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2770
  • [relay-client] Log exposed address by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2771
  • [client] Cleanup dns and route states on startup by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2757
  • [client] Fix controller re-connection by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2758
  • [client] Cleanup firewall state on startup by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2768

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.30.2...v0.30.3

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.31.0
entry.content:
Release Notes for v0.31.0

Highlights

[management] Setup key improvements #2775 - We added support to setup-key deletion, allowing account cleanup of revoked or expired keys. - The max expiration time was removed, allowing users to define any date for key expiration. - Setup-keys are now stored as hashs, improving security for systems.

Because of a database migration where the setup-keys are being hashed, a downgrade is no longer possible without restoring a backup. So, testing and making sure a backup is done before upgrading is highly recommended. See backup docs here: https://docs.netbird.io/selfhosted/selfhosted-guide#backup

Improvements

  • [client] Make native firewall init fail firewall creation #2784
  • [misc] Update Zitadel from v2.54.10 to v2.64.1 #2793
  • [client] allow relay leader on iOS #2795
  • [management] remove network map diff calculations #2820
  • [management] Add DB access duration to logs for context cancel #2781
  • [client] Log windows panics #2829

Bug fixes

  • [client] Ignore route rules with no sources instead of erroring out #2786
  • [client] Fix multiple peer name filtering in netbird status command #2798
  • [client] Fix the broken dependency gvisor.dev/gvisor #2789
  • [management] Fix peer meta isEqual #2807
  • [client] Nil check on ICE remote conn #2806
  • [client] Allocate new buffer for every package #2823
  • [client] Fix unused servers cleanup #2826
  • [client] Remove legacy forwarding rules in userspace mode #2782

New Contributors

  • @Codixer made their first contribution in #2793
  • @mgarces made their first contribution in #2798
  • @milantracy made their first contribution in #2789

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.30.3...v0.31.0

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.31.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [management] Fix add peer all group network map update by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2830
  • [misc] Avoid failing all other matrix tests if one fails by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2839
  • [client] Fix cached device flow oauth by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2833
  • [management] Fix network map update on peer validation by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2849
  • [client] Use the prerouting chain to mark for masquerading to support older systems by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2808
  • [relay-server] Use X-Real-IP in case of reverse proxy by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2848
  • [client] Exclude split default route ip addresses from anonymization by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2853
  • [management] Enforce max conn of 1 for sqlite setups by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2855
  • [management] Fix potential panic on inactivity expiration log message by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2854
  • [management] Add benchmark tests to get account with claims by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2761
  • [client] Use offload in WireGuard bind receiver by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2815
  • [management] Remove context from database calls by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2863
  • [management] Add peer lock to grpc server by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2859
  • [management] Fix api error message typo peers_group by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2862
  • [client] Remove loop after route calculation by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2856
  • [client] fix/proxy close by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2873
  • [client] Fix race conditions by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2869

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.31.0...v0.31.1

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.32.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [management] Refactor setup key to use store methods by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2861
  • [management] Add more logs to the peer update processes by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2881
  • [client] Improve state write timeout and abort work early on timeout by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2882
  • [relay-server] Always close ws conn when work thread exit by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2879
  • [client] Update route calculation tests by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2884
  • [client] Handle panic on nil wg interface by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2891
  • [management] Fix limited peer view groups by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2894
  • [client/management] add peer lock to peer meta update and fix isEqual func by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2840
  • [management] Limit the setup-key update operation by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2841
  • [management] Refactor group to use store methods by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2867
  • [management] Fix the Inactivity Expiration problem. by @ismail0234 in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2865
  • [client] Fix state manager race conditions by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2890
  • [client] Move state updates outside the refcounter by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2897
  • [client] Fix error state race on mgmt connection error by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2892

New Contributors

  • @ismail0234 made their first contribution in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2865

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.31.1...v0.32.0
